mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REMNDRLTTOTPBLANCDETAIL( HOUSE_MANAGE_NO, PBLANC_NO, HOUSE_NM, HOUSE_SECD, HOUSE_SECD_NM, HSSPLY_ZIP, HSSPLY_ADRES, TOT_SUPLY_HSHLDCO, RCRIT_PBLANC_DE, SUBSCRPT_RCEPT_BGNDE, SUBSCRPT_RCEPT_ENDDE, SPSPLY_RCEPT_BGNDE, SPSPLY_RCEPT_ENDDE, GNRL_RCEPT_RCPTDE, GNRL_RCEPT_ENDDE, PRZWNER_PRESNATN_DE, CNTRCT_CNCLS_BGNDE, CNTRCT_CNCLS_ENDDE, HMPG_ADRES, BSNS_MBY_NM, MDHS_TELNO, MVN_PREARNGE_YM ) VALUES(#{house_manage_no}, #{pblanc_no}, #{house_nm}, #{house_secd}, #{house_secd_nm}, #{hssply_zip}, #{hmpg_adres}, #{tot_suply_hshldco}, #{rcrit_pblanc_de}, #{subscrpt_rcept_bgnde}, #{subscrpt_rcept_endde}, #{spsply_rcept_bgnde}, #{spsply_rcept_endde}, #{gnrl_rcept_rcptde}, #{gnrl_rcept_endde}, #{przwner_presnatn_de}, #{cntrct_cncls_bgnde}, #{cntrct_cncls_endde}, #{hmpg_adres}, #{bsns_mby_nm}, #{mdhs_telno}, #{mvn_prearnge_ym})
